hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Check if published version is already present in repo package_name="ocaml" published_version="4.06.0"
#Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then sudo apt-get update available_version=$(sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Available version: $available_version" echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi
#==============================================================================================# echo "Available version: $available_version"
sudo zypper update -y
sudo zypper install -y gcc make git
./configure make world make opt make opt.opt umask 022 sudo make install
ocaml_version=`/usr/local/bin/ocaml --version` ocaml_new_version="The OCaml toplevel, version 4.06.1"
if [[ $ocaml_version == $ocaml_new_version ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi
